column5: Do you want to take your finance and accounting career to the next level? Whether you are a Finance and Accounting graduate or you already work in the field, our Finance and Accounting Masters can help develop your skills, knowledge and employment opportunities.Course detail & modulesWe are a leading provider of national and international business and finance education. Our proximity to the Thames Valley’s M4 corridor, Heathrow Airport and the City of London is a bonus for students.If you are an accounting and finance graduate, our MSc Finance and Accounting will provide an opportunity to gain more specialist knowledge. This will help you to identify and work towards your career goals.
